Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Clark/Division
ShortDescription: Red Line train are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near Clark/Division. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line train are standing in both directions due to an unauthorized person on the tracks near Clark/Division. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service between Roosevelt to Fullerton, in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
